title: All Permutations of a String
description: Print all permutations of a given string S. The output should be sorted lexicographically.
output_format: All permutations of S, separated by newlines.

sample_test_cases.output:
ABC
ACB
BAC
BCA
CAB
CBA

hidden_test_cases.output:
AAB
AAB
ABA
ABA
BAA
BAA
